item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description:
author:

  • Your Name date: 2025-10-20 title: My First Blog Post

Introduction

This is a sample blog post written in LaTeX. You can include mathematical equations like:

$$E = mc^2$$

Or inline equations like $F = ma$.

Features

  • Full LaTeX support

  • Mathematical equations

  • Code blocks

  • Tables and figures

Example Code

Here’s a sample code block:

def hello_world():
    print("Hello, World!")
